resources.string: Last month expenses for the same number of the current month days
Last month revenue for the same number of the current month days
Portfolio\'s currency and planning horizon days
Actual expenses for the same past period
Actual revenue for the same past period
Actual and planned expenses deviation. Red color used when actual value is more then planned.
Actual and planned revenue deviation. Red color used when actual value is less then planned.
The value of the transaction. The blue text color is used for a eliminable operations.
The total value of the transactions account after one is committed. Negative values display with red text color.

Schedule displays not only planned, but the actual operation, if they are in the selected period. For example, you can see not only how much expenditure is scheduled for this week, but how much expenses has already been paid. The report can be generated daily, weekly, and monthly.
Report is used for the identifying deviations between planned and actual spendings or revenue.
Report is based on transactions containing categories with Summary option and also both Expenses and Revenue options. The report calculates totals and turnovers of that transactions

Report is based on planned and actual transactions containing categories with Summary option and also either Expenses or Revenue option. The report calculates totals of planned transactions minus totals of actual transactions.

Fail to get SMS import tunes. May be SMS import tunes exchange is not allowed in the active profile or there is no connection to Wi-Fi or mobile Internet or remote SMS import tunes server is not accesible.
